org.restlet
Class RestletCallWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.UniformCallWrapper
      org.restlet.RestletCallWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
RestletCall, UniformCall
public class RestletCallWrapper
extends UniformCallWrapper
implements RestletCall

Restlet call wrapper. Useful for application developer who need to enrich the call with application related things.

See Also:
The decorator (aka wrapper) pattern

Method Detail

getPath

public String getPath(int index,
                      boolean strip)
Returns one of the paths in the list. The first path is the resource path relatively to the current restlet. The second path is the current reslet path relatively to the parent restlet. All the hierarchy of restlet paths is also available depending on the restlet tree.

Specified by:
getPath in interface RestletCall
Parameters:
index - Index of the path in the list.
strip - Indicates if leading and ending slashes should be stripped.
Returns:
The path at the given index.

getPaths

public List<String> getPaths()
Returns the list of restlets paths. The list is sorted according to the handlers hierarchy.

Specified by:
getPaths in interface RestletCall
Returns:
The list of restlets paths.

strip

public static String strip(String source)
Strip the slashing from both ends of the source string.

Parameters:
source - The source string to strip.
Returns:
The stripped string.

strip

public static String strip(String source,
                           char delimiter,
                           boolean start,
                           boolean end)
Strip a delimiter character from a source string.

Parameters:
source - The source string to strip.
delimiter - The character to remove.
start - Indicates if start of source should be stripped.
end - Indicates if end of source should be stripped.
Returns:
The stripped source string.
